arts.ttl: Pressure piles on Ange as Forest lose at Newcastle
arts.sum: Newcastle United became the latest team to get the better of Ange Postegoclou's Nottingham Forest as they registered a 2-0 win at St. James' Park.

arts.ttl: Pressure mounts on Ange Postecoglou as wait for first Forest win goes on
arts.sum: Newcastle 2-0 Nottingham Forest: Bruno Guimaraes and Nick Woltemade were on target for the hosts

arts.ttl: Newcastle vs Nottingham Forest LIVE: Under-presser Postecoglou needs a win
arts.sum:
Newcastle XI: Pope, Trippier, Thiaw, Botman, Burn, Tonali, Joelinton, Bruno G, Elanga, Woltemade, Gordon.

Nottingham Forest XI: Sels, Williams, Morato, Jair Cunha, Milenkovic, Savona, Yates, Anderson, Gibbs-White, Wood, Ndoye.

arts.ttl: Newcastle United vs Nottingham Forest – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Newcastle United will be looking to carry their midweek European form into the Premier League on Sunday when they host a struggling Nottingham Forest side at St. James’ Park. Eddie Howe’s team have endured their worst start to a season under his management. They face a Forest team, however, that is still winless under new […] The post Newcastle United vs Nottingham Forest – Match Preview and Team News first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Newcastle vs. Forest injury, suspension list, predicted XIs
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up all of the latest injury and suspension news ahead of Sunday's Premier League clash between Newcastle United and Nottingham Forest.
